original: 袁氏家族中四世居三公之位者多達五人，故號稱「四世三公」，門生故吏遍布天下。於三國初期影響力甚大。
text: There are as many as five members of the Yuan family in the fourth generation who occupy the position of the three males, so it is called the 'fourth generation and three males'. In the early days of the Three Kingdoms, it was very influential.
